summary: This mod changes the starting skills of all races to correspond more to Oblivion and Morrowind.
descriptionHtml:
This mod overhauls the skills, health, magicka and stamina of all Starting Races. 
Furthermore it adds 3 Perks to every Starting Character, depending on your race. 
It is mostly oriented on Morrowind Skill Settings and a little on Oblivion Skill Settings.

This mod only takes effect on new characters!

The new Bonuses are:

Altmer:
Health: 75
Magicka: 150
Stamina: 75
Illusion 5
Alteration 5
Conjuration 5
Destruction 10
Alchemy 5
Enchanting 5
Perks: Novice Destruction, Enchanter (Rank 1), Alchemist (Rank 1)

Argonian:
Health: 85
Magicka: 100
Stamina: 115
Lockpicking 10
Pickpocket 5
One-handed 5
Light Armor 5
Illusion 5
Alchemy 5
Perks: Novice Locks, Quick Hands, Light Fingers (Rank 1)

Bosmer:
Health: 80
Magicka: 80
Stamina: 140
Archery 15
Sneak 5
Alchemy 5
Light Armor 5
Alteration 5
Perks: Overdraw (Rank 1), Eagle Eye, Muffled Movement

Breton:
Health: 85
Magicka: 130
Stamina: 85
Conjuration 10
Illusion 5
Restoration 10
Alchemy 5
Alteration 5
Perks: Novice Conjuration, Soul Stealer, Recovery (Rank 1) 

Dunmer:
Health: 95
Magicka: 105
Stamina: 100
Destruction 10
Light Armor 5
One-handed 10
Archery 5
Two-handed 5
Perks: Novice Destruction, Armsman (Rank 1), Overdraw (Rank 1)

Imperial:
Health: 100
Magicka: 100
Stamina: 100
One-handed 10
Heavy Armor 5
Speech 15
Restoration 5
Perks: Haggling (Rank 1), Allure, Bladesman (Rank 1)

Khajiit:
Health: 90
Magicka: 100
Stamina: 110
Sneak 10
Lockpicking 5
Pickpocket 10
Light Armor 5
One-handed 5
Perks: Steahlt (Rank 1), Light Foot, Agile Defender (Rank 1)

Nord:
Health: 125
Magicka: 75
Stamina: 100
Two-handed 10
One-handed 5
Block 5
Smithing 5
Heavy Armor 5
Restoration 5
Perks: Limbsplitter (Rank 1), Skullcrusher (Rank 1), Juggernaut (Rank 1)

Orc:
Health: 125
Magicka: 85
Stamina: 90
Smithing 10
Heavy Armor 10
One-Handed 5
Two-Handed 5
Block 5
Perks: Steel Smithing, Juggernaut (Rank 1), PowerBash

Redguard:
Health: 110
Magicka: 75
Stamina: 115
One-handed 10
Two-handed 10
Block 5
Heavy Armor 5
Light Armor 5
Perks: Armsman (Rank 1), Bladesman (Rank 1), Barbarian (Rank 1)


Report all bugs to me, if you have ideas how to improve this mod you can also contact me or write a comment!

Please endorse it if you liked it and if you don\'t liked it I would appreciate constructive critics.

Currently two Versions are available one that only changes the Skills and a Full Version which includes all changes!

The Full Version is also available on Steamworkshop.
author: Trelares
